text:
The user interface allows the user to add Url Sample and Ftp Sample elements 
directly to the ThreadGroup.  As far as I know, you should only be able to add  
Url Sample to a WebTesting element, and add Ftp Sample to a FTPTesting element.

creator: mstover1@apache.org
text:
This is not a bug.  A test can be written with a URL Sample config element
directly added to the threadgroup.  This config element will provide "default"
values for the test.  In this way, a test script can be written with the
"domain" field left blank in all the Web Test controllers.  A single URL Sample
config element, with the domain name field filled in could be added to the
threadgroup, and it would fill in the missing domain field for all the Web Test
controllers.  This test script can now be used to test multiple servers running
the same app, with only 1 change to the test plan.
